channel.title: 🟠 Ubuntu on Dawn Journey
channel.description: Recent content in 🟠 Ubuntu on Dawn Journey

item.title: Ubuntu 常用命令
item.description: 国内镜像源 apt 清华源 配置地址：/etc/apt/sources.list ubuntu | 镜像站使用帮助 | 清华大学开源软件镜像站 | Tsinghua Open Source Mirror 快速配置镜像源 Ubuntu 20.04 LTS echo "deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal-backports main restricted universe multiverse deb http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ focal-security main restricted universe multiverse" > /etc/apt/sources.list Ubuntu 22.04 LTS echo "deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ jammy main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ jammy-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ jammy-backports main restricted universe multivers deb http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ jammy-security main restricted universe multiverse" > /etc/apt/sources.list 清除所有
